My #20yearchallenge.... been an amazing last 20yrs,look forward to the next 20yrs
A post shared by Malaika Arora (@malaikaaroraofficial) on Jan 17, 2019 at 10:44pm PST
title: Giving In To Temptation, Malaika Arora Posts 20-Year-Old Pic For #10YearChallenge, Gets Trolled
description: Chaiyya Chaiyya girl Malaika Arora also took up the challenge recently. However, instead of posting a 10-year-old picture, she had apparently posted a 20-year-old photo. As you may have expected, people were quick to notice it. Chaiyya Chaiyya girl Malaika Arora also took up the challenge recently.
